ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_MeleeWeapon_Chainsword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Chainsword
ThingDef.description: Chainswords are not subtle weapons, and wielding one is a statement in its own right: they are horrific tools of war, designed to bite, tear and eviscerate where more primitive blades merely cut and slice.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_MeleeWeapon_Chainshortsword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Chain Shortsword
ThingDef.description: Chainswords are not subtle weapons, and wielding one is a statement in its own right: they are horrific tools of war, designed to bite, tear and eviscerate where more primitive blades merely cut and slice.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_MeleeWeapon_TrenchShovel_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Trench Shovel
ThingDef.description: Trench Shovels are used by the Astra Militarum to dig trenches with. The Death Korps of Krieg have put such Shovels to legendary use in their service to the Imperium.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_GW_AM_PowerSwordBase
ThingDef.description: Power Swords are one of the preeminent types of Power Weapons. When its power cell is activated, the blade becomes sheathed in a lethal haze of a disruptive energy field. This field allows the blade to easily rip through armor and flesh alike.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_MeleeWeapon_PowerFist_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Power Fist
ThingDef.description: A Power Fist is large and slow in combat, and so the bearer must be willing to risk the blows of his enemy before he can strike back. However, a Power Fist vastly augments a user's strength, much as power armour does due to the power provided its mechanical servos.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_Agripinaamkii
ThingDef.label: Agripinaa MKII
ThingDef.description: Autoguns, reluctantly favoured by planetary defence forces and gangers alike for thier ease of manufacturing compared to the more modern lasgun. The Agripinaa MKII is the most widely available model amongst the militarum for those few foes that are resliliant to las-burn.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_Agripinaamkiitanker
ThingDef.label: Tanker Agripinaa MKII
ThingDef.description: Autoguns, reluctantly favoured by planetary defence forces and gangers alike for thier ease of manufacturing compared to the more modern lasgun. The Agripinaa MKII is the most widely available model amongst the militarum for those few foes that are resliliant to las-burn. This particular Autogun has been field modified for use by tankers and pilots.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_OrlockAutogun
ThingDef.label: Orlock Autogun
ThingDef.description: Autoguns, reluctantly favoured by planetary defence forces and gangers alike for thier ease of manufacturing compared to the more modern lasgun. This pattern was devised in the underbelly of the hiveworld Necromunda by the gunsmiths of the Orlock gang.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_Zarona
ThingDef.label: Zarona MKII
ThingDef.description: Stub Revolvers are one of the oldest and most reliable designs still used by humanity. The Zarona MKII is a classic example of such a design.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_Hiveworldautopistol
ThingDef.label: Hiveworld Autopistol
ThingDef.description: A favorite of the gangers that roam the passages of the Imperiums hive cities, Autopistols are conventional weapons of simple construction that vary wildly in design. Often as crude and inelegant as the hand that craft them.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_Heavystubber
ThingDef.label: Heavy Stubber
ThingDef.description: A mainstay support weapon on lower-technology level planets that cannot maintain laser weapons in working order due to technological or resource limitations, and also popular with outlaws and hive gangers, the Heavy Stubber is ideal for fighting off large numbers of enemies or even lightly armoured vehicles. Its high rate of fire makes up for its lack of strength and armour-piercing abilities.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_MilitarumShotgun
ThingDef.label: Militarum Shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient Imperial ballistic weapon, much the same as the Heavy Stubber, which fires solid slugs that burst into submunitions to spread out over a wider area.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_MilitarumShotgunSawn
ThingDef.label: Sawn Off Militarum Shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient Imperial ballistic weapon, much the same as the Heavy Stubber, which fires solid slugs that burst into submunitions to spread out over a wider area. Shotguns are commonly used by criminal lowlifes in the lawless regions of most hive cities, oftentimes cutting length from the barrel for ease of concealment.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Kantraelsanctified
ThingDef.label: Sanctified Kantrael MG
ThingDef.description: A staple of the Cadian Shock Troopers and by extension the militarum at large. This particular weapon has been sanctified, wrapped in holy scripture and affixed with a purity seal. It seems it must have once belonged to someone of great importance and as such, is much revered by the Ministorum.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Lascarbinefoursanctified
ThingDef.label: Sanctified MK4 Lascarbine
ThingDef.description: The Mk4 lascarbine is the standard variant for the Catachan Jungle Fighters. This particular weapon has been sanctified, wrapped in holy scripture and affixed with a purity seal. It seems it must have once belonged to someone of great importance and as such, is much revered by the Ministorum.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_VossPatternsanctified
ThingDef.label: Sanctified Voss MKI
ThingDef.description: The Voss pattern is the standard variant for the Armageddon Steel Legion. This particular weapon has been sanctified, wrapped in holy scripture and affixed with a purity seal. It seems it must have once belonged to someone of great importance and as such, is much revered by the Ministorum.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Bullet_Lasbolt_Bond
ThingDef.label: Lasbolt
ThingDef.description: A beam of focused light that burns the target.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Bullet_Lasbolttwo_Bond
ThingDef.label: Lasbolt Charged
ThingDef.description: An heavily charged beam of focused light, emitting more heat usual.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Bullet_Lasboltsmall_Bond
ThingDef.label: Pistol Lasbolt
ThingDef.description: A reduced beam of focused light.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Kantrael_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kantrael MG
ThingDef.description: A staple of the Cadian Shock Troopers and by extension the militarum at large.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Kantraelt_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kantrael MG-t
ThingDef.description: A variant of the Kantrael MG favoured by forces on Tertium. It boasts some minor imporvements over the base pattern, namely a more ergonomic fire select and a small visual indicator for when the battery is empty.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Lascarbinefour_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK4 Lascarbine
ThingDef.description: The Mk4 lascarbine is the standard variant for the Catachan Jungle Fighters.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_VossPattern_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Voss MKI
ThingDef.description: The Voss pattern is the standard variant for the Armageddon Steel Legion.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Accatranfive_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Accatran MKIV
ThingDef.description: The smaller profile of the Accatran MkIV is perfectly suited to the drop missions Elysian regiments often undertake, easily manoeuvred at short range or fired from the hip. Further, its lighter design allows wielders to carry other equipment in place of the extra bulk.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Lucius_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lucius MKI
ThingDef.description: The signature weapon of the Death Korps of Krieg, the Lucius lasgun discharges a more powerful shot. This puts a great strain on the weapon, limiting the rate of fire and requiring such features as additional heat sink rings lining the exterior of the barrel.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Kantraeldefender_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kantrael MG Defender
ThingDef.description: This pattern is a standart issue to NCOs and officers in the Regiments of Cadian Shock Troopers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Kantraeldefendert_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kantrael MG-t Defender
ThingDef.description: A variant of the Kantrael MG Defender favoured by forces on Tertium. It boasts some minor imporvements over the base pattern, namely a more ergonomic fire select and a small visual indicator for when the battery is empty.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Hellgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Ryza Hellgun
ThingDef.description: A Ryza Hellgun\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Locke_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Locke MKI
ThingDef.description: A stripped down and lightweight lascarbine favoured by regiments from worlds without the resources for more contemporary models.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GW_AM_Gun_Longlas_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Longlas
ThingDef.description: Favoured by Imperial Guard Sharpshooters, the Long-Las, is a specially modified version of the standard Lasgun constructed for increased range and accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: HP_AM_Gun_PlasmaGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Astra Militarum Plasma Gun
ThingDef.description: The Plasma Gun is a rifle-sized Plasma Weapon common to many of the armed forces of the Imperium of Man. It is classified as a special weapon and is carried by a variety of Imperial infantry, including Space Marines, Imperial Guardsmen and Storm Troopers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: HP_AM_Gun_MeltaGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Astra Militarum Melta Gun
ThingDef.description: The Meltagun, also called a "Fusion Gun," "Melter," or "Cooker," is a powerful, short-ranged anti-armour weapon that produces an intense, energetic beam of heat in the tens of thousands of degrees Centigrade.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
